products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind

A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor. We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore.

products.title: Ecowood, Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a gentle, creamy beige, the ecowood in pistachio shell fine grain offers a classic wood texture that adds to its feel of authenticity. The colour is subtle and understated, so it's easily matched, and the wide slats are strong and easy to use. Settle the pistachio shell fine grain against a deep plum purple for a strong and moody bedroom look. Hang the blind on a purple feature wall, painting the others cream or the palest of biscuits, and match bedding and accessories to the plum shade.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind

Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
